entry.title: Youre Application Privacy Policy
entry.content:
The Youre app takes your user privacy very seriously. We may collect and use information about you when you use our services. Through this Privacy Policy, we want to explain to you how we collect, use, store and share this information when using our services and how we can provide you with access, update, control and protection of this information. By using or continuing to use our services, you agree to our collection, use, and storage of your information in accordance with this Privacy Policy.

Part I The information we may collect about you includes the following You authorize this application to record audio, all sounds and text messages are saved locally.

Part two how we may use the information we collect Provide you with reminders of your recorded voice; For archiving the results and statistical information after you use this application; Used for software upgrades and management.

Part III Information Storage and Protection The information and data collected about you by this application will be stored in this application through encryption technology as a file for notification reminders.

Part 4 We will not actively share your personal privacy and purchase information, except in the following situations Information you actively share using this application; Disclosed to third parties with your prior consent; Disclose to third parties or administrative or judicial institutions according to the relevant laws and regulations of your area or the requirements of administrative or judicial institutions; If you violate the relevant laws and regulations in your area or this application service agreement or related rules, you need to disclose to third parties; If you are a complainant of intellectual property rights and have filed a complaint, you should disclose it to the respondent at the request of the respondent so that the two parties can resolve possible disputes over rights.

Part V Reservations and Cancellations The information obtained by this application will remain on your mobile device until you no longer use and delete this application from your mobile device, and this information will be deleted at the same time.

Part VI Protection of Minor Information We take the protection of minors' information very seriously. If you are a minor under 18 years of age, your guardian needs to read this Privacy Policy carefully and agree or authorize your consent to use our products and / or services in accordance with this Privacy Policy. If you are a minor under the age of 14, your guardian needs to read this Privacy Policy carefully and expressly consent to your use of our products and / or services in accordance with this Privacy Policy. If you / your guardian disagree with any of this Privacy Policy, you should immediately stop using our products and / or services.

Part VII Changes in Privacy Policy We may revise the terms of this Privacy Policy in due course to form part of this Privacy Policy. If the amendment results in a substantial reduction in your rights under this Privacy Policy, we will promptly notify you or send you an email or otherwise notify you before the amendment takes effect. In that case, if you continue to use our services, you agree to be bound by this revised Privacy Policy.
